price: Umjesto Allaha oni obožavaju one koji nisu u stanju neku im korist pribaviti niti od njih kakvu štetu otkloniti. Nevjernik je šejtanov pomagač protiv njegovog Gospodara.
arabic: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمۡ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمۡۗ وَكَانَ ٱلۡكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ ظَهِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yanfaʿuhum walā yaḍurruhum wakāna al-kāfiru ʿalā rabbihi ẓahīran
